summary: Ethics, being human and the soul come to the fore when a 7-year old finds a bag of Pounds just days before the currency is switched to Euros and learns what we are really made of.
cast: Alex Etel|Lewis McGibbon|James Nesbitt|Daisy Donovan|Christopher Fulford|Pearce Quigley|Jane Hogarth|Alun Armstrong|Enzo Cilenti|Nasser Memarzia|Kathryn Pogson|Harry Kirkham|Cornelius Macarthy|Kolade Agboke|Leslie Phillips|James Quinn|Mark Chatterton|Toby Walton|Frank Cottrell Boyce|Christy Cullen|Gunnar Winbergh|Christian Rubeck|Guy Flanagan|Philippa Howarth|Billy Hyland|John Nugent|Steve Garti|Alice Grice|Dale Stringer|Warren Donnelly|Emily Aston|Denny James Smith|Bina Patel|Lisa Millett|Neville Skelly|Daniel Weyman|Tara Moran|Michele Whitehead|Maggie Norris|Ian Conningham|Richard Styles|Jo Hicks|Mark Craig|Nicky Evans|Ryan Kruger
title: Millones
